snippet: Rising energy demand in emerging economies, like China and India, is a driving force in the natural gas and oil industry and is helping to push prices higher. At the same time, technological advances are making the recovery of more conventional and...
lead_paragraph: Rising energy demand in emerging economies, like China and India, is a driving force in the natural gas and oil industry and is helping to push prices higher. At the same time, technological advances are making the recovery of more conventional and unconventional resources feasible, reshaping the energy landscape around the world.
